message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for your business, potentially even more than my asking price.  To start the conversation, I'm proposing a price of $1,100,000.  What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $950,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value, however, I believe my initial offer is closer to the true worth this product brings.  Would you consider $1,050,000?  This feels like a fair compromise.
I've given this some more thought, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product offers, I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000.
